alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 3:16PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lander, north central Nye and southwestern Eureka Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 315 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Garden Pass to 19 miles west of Eureka to 29 miles southeast of Hickison Summit. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Garden Pass and Antelope Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM PDT for south central and north central Nevada.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
